data.message: I wish we could post in places for your to read instead of this way.  Or be able to send you an email.  Just a heads up.  Is there anyway for members of groups to turn off the option to receive a noise on their phones  or email every time someone post in a particular group.  I am finding people are leaving groups because of this very reason.  The notifications have gotten crazy and you could see a huge drop soon if we aren't careful.  Thank you for your time.
